summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust, detailing account balances and transaction activity for the month of February 2016. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and account management instructions.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the account holder of the insurance trust account at Deutsche Bank, with transactions recorded for February 2016.

persons.name: Jj Litchford
persons.context: Jj Litchford is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The document is a financial statement for the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust.
The account had a beginning balance of $241.45 and an ending balance of $241.45 for February 2016.
There were no overdrafts or NSF fees reported for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
The statement covers transactions from February 1, 2016, to February 29, 2016.
